sile.script:
-- Two column layout. It might be cleaner to use a two-column class but this is fine. local class = SILE.documentState.documentClass class:declareFrame("a", {left= "5%pw", right= "47.5%pw", top="5%ph", bottom="90%ph",next= "b" }) class:declareFrame("b", {left= "52.5%pw", right= "95%pw", top="5%ph", bottom="90%ph" }) class:declareFrame("folio",{left = "5%pw", right = "95%pw", top = "92%ph", bottom = "97%ph", id = "folio"}) class.pageTemplate.firstContentFrame = SILE.getFrame("a")
SILE.settings.set("typesetter.parseppattern", "




+") if not SILE.scratch then SILE.scratch = {} end
SILE.registerCommand("verse", function(options, content) if options.eID then return end local id = options.osisID c,v = string.match(id, "(%d+).(%d+)$") if not (c == SILE.scratch.chapter) then io.stderr:write(" ("..c..") ") SILE.call("bigskip") SILE.call("font", { weight = 700, size = "15pt"}, { "Chapter ".. c }) SILE.typesetter:leaveHmode() SILE.call("bigskip") SILE.scratch.chapter = c SILE.typesetter:pushVpenalty({penalty = 10000 }) end SILE.call("font", { weight = 700, size = "7pt"}, { v.." " }) SILE.typesetter:pushPenalty({penalty = 10000 })
SILE.process(content) end)
SILE.registerCommand("div", function(options, content) if (options.type == "book") then SILE.documentState.thisPageTemplate = { frames = { t = SILE.newFrame({left= "5%pw", right= "95%pw", top="5%ph", bottom="15%ph", id= "t", next= "l" }), l = SILE.newFrame({left= "5%pw", right= "47.5%pw", top="20%ph", bottom="90%ph", id= "l", next= "r" }), r = SILE.newFrame({left= "52.5%pw", right= "95%pw", top="20%ph", bottom="90%ph", id= "r" }), folio = SILE.newFrame({left = "5%pw", right = "95%pw", top = "92%ph", bottom = "97%ph", id = "folio"}) } }; SILE.documentState.thisPageTemplate.firstContentFrame = SILE.documentState.thisPageTemplate.frames.t SILE.typesetter:init(SILE.getFrame("t")) end SILE.process(content) SILE.call("supereject") SILE.typesetter:leaveHmode(); end)
